situation: W felt overwhelmed during math activities involving group tasks due to difficulty processing numbers and sensory input.
action: The teacher aide adapted math activities with a focus on tactile learning tools and provided individual learning spaces. They also broke down problems into manageable parts and tempered sensory inputs.
effect: W was able to focus and contribute to group math tasks, feeling less overwhelmed. The adjustments helped improve his confidence and participation, fostering a more inclusive math learning environment.
